text: iprahimum, ismayilum, is'hakkum, yahkupum, innum avarkalutaiya cantatiyinar yavarum niccayamaka yutarkal allatu kiristavarkale" enru kurukinrirkala? (Napiye!) Nir ketpiraka"(itaip parri) unkalukku nanrakat teriyuma allatu allahvukka? Allahvitamiruntu tanpal vantirukkum catciyankalai maraippavanaivita aniyayakkaran yar? Innum allah ninkal ceypavai parri paramukamaka illai
